pkgmetadata.longdescription: A sample Python project=======================This package is to investigate a possible security issue with pip changingthe --user syntax for Travis projects.https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/user_guide/#user-installspip install --user $USER git+https://github.com/google/closure-linter.gitresults in```Could not find any downloads that satisfy the requirement travis```See e.g. https://github.com/travis-ci/travis-ci/issues/6905
